actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to provide grants to the 1890 land grant colleges, including Tuskegee Institute, in the purchase of equipment and land, and the planning, construction, alteration or renovation of buildings to strengthen their capacity to conduct food and agricultural research.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations for fiscal years 1982 through 1986 to the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out a program of grants to States to assist "1890 land grant colleges," including Tuskegee Institutes, in acquiring and improving agricultural and food research facilities, equipment, and land. Sets forth formulas for the distribution of such funds. Provides that, in computing such distribution, the allotments to Tuskegee Institute and Alabama Agricultural and Mechanical University shall be determined as if each institution were in a separate State.

titles.title: A bill to provide grants to the 1890 land grant colleges, including Tuskegee Institute, in the purchase of equipment and land, and the planning, construction, alteration or renovation of buildings to strengthen their capacity to conduct food and agricultural research.
